We nonetheless *have* a roadmap.

= Ardb-v2.0 =
Ardb will be the first release to introduce new feature and major codebase upgrades.

== Brand new in this release ==
Ardb-v2.0 will introduce the following new featues:
  * Card Browser image panel [http://code.google.com/p/ardb/issues/detail?id=3 ENH-03]
  * Improved Deck Statistics [http://code.google.com/p/ardb/issues/detail?id=5 ENH-05]
  * New Updater codebase

== Packaging ==
Ardb-v2.0 will be packaged for the following Operating Systems:
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windows Windows 2000/XP/Vista]
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ubuntu_%28Linux_distribution%29 Ubuntu Linux]
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OS_X OS X Leopard]
